message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $80.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but $80 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $160. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $160 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm sticking to my offer of $80. It's the best I can do.
